arts.ttl: How Liverpool's next five fixtures compare to Arsenal's after nervy Wolves win
arts.sum: How Liverpool's next five Premier League fixtures compare to that of primary challengers Arsenal.

arts.ttl: 'Today we praise VAR' - MOTD pundits discuss Liverpool v Wolves
arts.sum: Match Of The Day 2 pundits Ashley Williams and Micah Richards praise the intervention of VAR as a penalty initially awarded to Liverpool in their 2-1 win over Wolves is overturned.

arts.ttl: FPL notes: Gakpo injury update, why Konate was subbed + Cunha threat
arts.sum: Reaction from Liverpool v Wolves and Spurs v Man Utd The post FPL notes: Gakpo injury update, why Konate was subbed + Cunha threat appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Gary Neville believes Arsenal have gained 'hope' in the title race with Liverpool despite the Reds' win over Wolves - as Jamie Redknapp says top-two battle will be 'edgy' until the end
arts.sum: Arne Slot's side survived a second-half scare to beat the relegation-threatened visitors 2-1 and reclaim their seven-point lead over the Gunners, who claimed a 2-0 victory at Leicester a day earlier.

arts.ttl: Premier League explain why Liverpool denied after Wolves decision U-turn
arts.sum: Reds saw two key decisions go against them in a disappointing second half-performance at Anfield

arts.ttl: Wolves boss makes feelings clear as Arne Slot makes sub to avoid Liverpool red card
arts.sum: Liverpool just about did enough to squeeze past Wolves at Anfield on Sunday with it being suggested that the Premier League leaders were fortunate not to have been reduced to ten men

arts.ttl: Liverpool told why they got lucky with Wolves decision despite Jamie Carragher claim
arts.sum: Reds struggled during second half but could have gone down to 10 men

arts.ttl: Liverpool set unwanted 21-year club record in tense Wolves win
arts.sum: Liverpool got the job done against Wolves, winning their Premier League clash 2-1 at Anfield, but broke a surprising record in the process.

arts.ttl: Slot took off Konaté to avoid ‘soft’ red card in Liverpool win against Wolves
arts.sum: ‘You can’t play knowing you can’t make a foul’ Manager praises team response to Wolves’ fightback Arne Slot admitted he withdrew Ibrahima Konaté at half-time against Wolves to save the Liverpool defender from a second yellow card, as the Premier League leaders secured a nervous victory at Anfield. Liverpool restored their seven-point advantage over Arsenal but played with doubts caused by James Tarkowski’s 98th-minute equaliser for Everton in the Merseyside derby, according to Slot. Konaté could have increased their problems when, having been booked for dragging back Matheus Cunha, he collided late with the Wolves playmaker shortly before the interval. The referee, Simon Hooper, ignored Wolves’ appeals for a second yellow and thus a red card. “I cannot change anything now but in my opinion it was a second yellow card,” Vítor Pereira, the head coach, said. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Pereira pleased with second-half Wolves performance
arts.sum: Wolves boss Vitor Pereira admits his team only "woke up" in the second half of their match against Liverpool and says he is pleased with their performance for the final 45 minutes of their 2-1 defeat at Anfield.
